News.headline: Interview: Scott Heard On Signing For The Daggers
News.page_title: Interview: Scott Heard On Signing For The Daggers
News.URL_keywords: Interview: Scott Heard On Signing For The Daggers
News.short_description: Mideiflder Scott Heard on signing for Dagenham and Redbridge and making his debut for the club on Tuesday against Aldershot Town.
News.description:
"It was a really tough game on Tuesday, especially coming on as a sub for my debut, as it was quite late on the game but the manager told me to just stay calm and get into the positions where I can be effective."

"I wanted to defend from the font foot, and the manager showed great faith in me to put me on when I only signed last week, so I was really buzzing to get on in the game."

"Playing alongside players like Boucaud and Robinson and even training with them you can see the experience and skill that they have, and I just want to learn of these players."

"I really want to improve and I feel that I am still young enough to improve my game, and I am thankful for the chance that the manager and the club have put in me and want to repay that faith when I am on the pitch."

"Looking ahead to Saturdayâ€™s game we have just got to play our own game and to our strengths which will help us to get a result."
